alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 9:43PM CST until March 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Portions of east central, northeast and southeast Iowa and northwest Illinois. * WHEN...Until noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A very narrow band of higher amounts is possible. Also, a brief period of freezing drizzle is possible in some areas late tonight and early Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Jo Daviess; Rock Island; Stephenson; Whiteside
